document_data.name: Rukhelmoth Glitterstone
document_data.mainbody: '''Rukhelmoth Glitterstone''', or simply '''Rukh''' was a [[deep gnome]] explorer who was held prisoner of the [[Cult of the Black Earth]] at the [[Temple of the Black Earth]] in [[Tyar-Besil]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], while attempting to sneak into the [[Fane of the Eye]], Rukh was captured by Black Earth cultists. They decided to sacrifice her to a [[black pudding]] living under the temple. However, some adventurers infiltrated the temple, defeated the cultists, and freed her.
